org.apache.ambari.server.controller.jmx

Interface JMXHostProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractProviderModule, ConfigBasedJmxHostProvider, DefaultProviderModule

    public interface JMXHostProvider
    Provider of JMX host information.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<String> getHostNames(String clusterName, String componentName)
      Get the JMX host names for the given cluster name and component name.
      String getJMXProtocol(String clusterName, String componentName)
      Get the protocol for the specified cluster name and component.
      String getJMXRpcMetricTag(String clusterName, String componentName, String port)
      Get the rpc tag for the specified cluster name, component and port number
      String getPort(String clusterName, String componentName, String hostName, boolean httpsEnabled)
      Get the port for the specified cluster name and component.
      String getPublicHostName(String clusterName, String hostName) 

    • Method Detail

      • getPublicHostName

        String getPublicHostName(String clusterName,
                         String hostName)

      • getHostNames

        Set<String> getHostNames(String clusterName,
                         String componentName)
        Get the JMX host names for the given cluster name and component name.
        Parameters:
        clusterName - the cluster name
        componentName - the component name
        Returns:
        set of JMX host names

      • getPort

        String getPort(String clusterName,
               String componentName,
               String hostName,
               boolean httpsEnabled)
        Get the port for the specified cluster name and component.
        Parameters:
        clusterName - the cluster name
        componentName - the component name
        hostName - the component hostName
        httpsEnabled - https enabled
        Returns:
        the port for the specified cluster name and component

      • getJMXProtocol

        String getJMXProtocol(String clusterName,
                      String componentName)
        Get the protocol for the specified cluster name and component.
        Parameters:
        clusterName - the cluster name
        componentName - the component name
        Returns:
        the JMX protocol for the specified cluster name and component, one of http or https

      • getJMXRpcMetricTag

        String getJMXRpcMetricTag(String clusterName,
                          String componentName,
                          String port)
        Get the rpc tag for the specified cluster name, component and port number
        Parameters:
        clusterName - the cluster name
        componentName - the componentName name
        port - the port number
        Returns:
        the RPC tag for the specified cluster name, component and port number(client/healthcheck/etc.).
